mapper.insert: insert into items ( id, item_name, store_id, item_type, is_available, price, price_pure, currency, url ) values( default, #{item_name}, #{store_id}, #{item_type}, #{is_available}, #{price}, #{price_pure}, #{currency}, #{url} ) ON CONFLICT (url) DO UPDATE SET price = excluded.price, is_available = excluded.is_available;
